name: balatro-compendium
title: Balatro Compendium
description: Search through every piece of the Balatro collection entierly inside Raycast. Even offline.
author: azyz

commands.name: tarot
commands.title: Tarot
commands.subtitle: Balatro Compendium
commands.description: Display all Tarot Cards from Balatro

commands.name: spectral
commands.title: Spectral
commands.subtitle: Balatro Compendium
commands.description: Display all Spectral Cards from Balatro

commands.name: vouchersplus
commands.title: Vouchers+
commands.subtitle: Balatro Compendium
commands.description: Display all upgraded Vouchers from Balatro

commands.name: enhancements
commands.title: Enhancements
commands.subtitle: Balatro Compendium
commands.description: Display all Cards Enhancements from Balatro

commands.name: tags
commands.title: Tags
commands.subtitle: Balatro Compendium
commands.description: Display all Skip Tags from Balatro

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
